    • Constructor Detail

      • Character

        protected Character(java.lang.String name,
                    int level)
        Constructor of Character class. This is the constructor of the Character class. It sets some of the attributes based on the level of the character created.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the character being created.
        level - Level of the character being created.
